turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay which Starbucks location would you like to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to use the location in Sidney Ohio please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Large Iced White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you want whip cream on top & what milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please & i'd like it made with white milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When would you like me to place your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I will call them now & then give you a call back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey, I just placed your order. I'm on my way to get it now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I should have it to you in about 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Will you get me extra creamer packets too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yup, no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I really appreciate it. How much was my total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total was $4.50.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I will pay you back when you get here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I just got here. I'm bringing your coffee in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Here is your coffee and extra creamer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yummy, I'm so excited. I love Iced White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I hope you enjoy it .

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I really appreciate you getting it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yup no problem at all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Here is your $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay thanks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup. Bye now. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye. You have a great day too!
